name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Highly skilled Senior SRE Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend system design and delivery. Proficient in **Linux**, **DevOps**, and **Automation**, with a strong focus on observability and reliability. Expertise in **Python** and advanced knowledge in infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and configuration management with **SaltStack**. Experienced in continuous integration and delivery using **Jenkins**, and monitoring stack including **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to ensure service level objectives (SLO) are met. Adept at creating high-performing APIs and scalable services within **AWS** and **Azure** cloud-native architectures. Proven ability to communicate effectively and collaborate in high-performance teams while contributing to impactful projects at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Linux** to configure and maintain cloud environments, supporting the automation of service deployment and management processes.
Implemented **DevOps** practices to enhance collaboration and efficiency across development and operations teams, resulting in a **30%** reduction in deployment times.
Engineered scalable backend services in **Python** and integrated automated testing pipelines via **Jenkins**, improving reliability in software releases by **25%**.
Managed infrastructure as code using **Terraform** for consistent environment setup and quick provisioning of resources, reducing environment setup times by **60%**.
Employed **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to establish service-level objectives (SLOs) and enhance observability of system performance, contributing to an uptime improvement of **99.9%**.
Developed and executed automation strategies to streamline configuration management with **SaltStack**, ensuring compliance and consistency across applications.
Fostered strong communication and interpersonal skills while collaborating with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges and enhance overall project success.

• Implemented automation strategies using **Python** and **Terraform** to optimize infrastructure management and deployment processes, reducing provisioning time by **30%**.
• Developed and managed scalable microservices in **FastAPI** with **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial transactions, enhancing processing speed by **50%**.
• Oversaw DevOps practices to ensure seamless integration and delivery pipelines, utilizing tools such as **Jenkins** to improve release cycle time by **20%**.
• Designed and maintained observability with **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to monitor system performance, increasing uptime to **99.9%**.
• Streamlined configuration management through **SaltStack**, ensuring consistency across deployment environments and reducing configuration drift by **25%**.
• Executed security audits and implemented best practices, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and access control, aligning with compliance standards.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, enhancing communication and interpersonal skills to ensure successful project outcomes and regulatory adherence.

- Utilized **Linux** environments to deploy and manage robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL**, significantly enhancing trading operations.
- Leveraged **DevOps** practices to engineer real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, ensuring the delivery of up-to-the-minute trading data for **high-frequency transactions** at scale, handling **over 1,000** messages per second.
- Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, optimizing user interaction with the platform, resulting in a **30%** increase in client engagement metrics.
- Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols, effectively reducing potential risks by **40%** through enhanced security measures.
- Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles, achieving a **25%** reduction in deployment failures.
- Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, leading to a **50%** improvement in task completion times.
- Automated infrastructure management using **Terraform** and **SaltStack**, enhancing the configuration management process and reducing provisioning time by **60%**.
- Established monitoring and observability frameworks using **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, enabling precise tracking of service-level objectives (SLO) and improving system reliability.
